SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.Classes

Class CardView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.Classes.CardView
public class CardView extends Object
Implementation of a Card for the GUI. A CardView is a container for a Card's textures, containing its Front and Back.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardView

      public CardView(javafx.scene.image.Image front, javafx.scene.image.Image back)
      Constructor Method with Images. All CardViews are created facing their Front Side by default.
      Parameters:
      front - : Image containing the texture for the Front Side
      back - : Image containing the texture for the Back Side

    • CardView

      public CardView(String frontName, String backName)
      Constructor Method with Strings. All CardViews are created facing their Front Side by default.
      Parameters:
      frontName - : String containing the texture URL path for the Front Side Image
      backName - : String containing the texture URL path for the Back Side Image

  • Method Details

    • isOddRotation

      public boolean isOddRotation()
      Getter Method for oddRotation. This is used to specify the amount of times a CardView has been flipped, because the animation changes based on that value.
      Returns:
      a boolean value indicating whether it's an odd or even rotation (true for odd, false for even).

    • setOddRotation

      public void setOddRotation(boolean oddRotation)
      Setter Method for oddRotation. This is used to specify the amount of times a CardView has been flipped, because the animation changes based on that value. This needs to be called to invert the value every time a CardView is animated (flip).
      Parameters:
      oddRotation - : a boolean value indicating whether the next rotation is an odd or even rotation (true for odd, false for even).

    • isFrontFacing

      public boolean isFrontFacing()
      Getter Method for isFrontFacing.
      Returns:
      a boolean value indicating which Side the CardView is showing: true for Front, false for Back.

    • setFrontFacing

      public void setFrontFacing(boolean frontFacing)
      Setter Method for isFrontFacing.
      Parameters:
      frontFacing - : a boolean value indicating which Side the CardView is showing: true for Front, false for Back.

    • getFront

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getFront()
      Getter Method for the Front Image.
      Returns:
      an Image containing the Front Image texture.

    • setFront

      public void setFront(javafx.scene.image.Image front)
      Setter Method for the Front Image.
      Parameters:
      front - : an Image containing the Front Image Texture.

    • getBack

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getBack()
      Getter Method for the Back Image.
      Returns:
      an Image containing the Back Image texture.

    • setBack

      public void setBack(javafx.scene.image.Image back)
      Setter Method for the Back Image.
      Parameters:
      back - : an Image containing the Back Image Texture.

    • flip

      public void flip()
      Setter Method for isFrontFacing. Inverts the current value of isFrontFacing.
